name: Cracked 2018 Dark Style
description:
A sleak new color scheme that is easy on the eyes!

Combine with my Cracked 2018 Wide & Trimmed style for best results!
additional_info:
I maintain the trimmed and dark styles separately, so they auto update properly!

Still a work in progress, so more tweaks to come soon!

-Updates-
--2018--
May 29 - Made some fixes. Don't know how much longer I will suport this style. Cracked is a dumpsterfire these days.

--2017--
Dec 16 - Small fixes.
Nov 23 - More tweaks.
Nov 15 - More tweaks and fixes.

discussions.name: Love it, just one thing (Because of course.) :P
